sentences.en: Another function related to the Exchange Fund is currency issuance.
sentences.cn: 另一项与外汇基金有关的功能是纸币与硬币的发行.

sentences.en: Auction and repeatedly issuance of line operation license are not allowed.
sentences.cn: 禁止拍卖、重复授予线路经营许可证.

sentences.en: Is the issuance of employee identification and controlled by a specific department?
sentences.cn: 员工证的发放是否专门的部门负责?

sentences.en: Issuance of 3 G licenses soon, good communications equipment business.
sentences.cn: 3G牌照即将发放, 利好通讯设备商.

sentences.en: Signature validation failed for the official template included in Issuance License.
sentences.cn: “发行许可证”中包含的正式模板未通过签名验证.

sentences.en: Structured issuance ballooned to $ 2 trillion last year and grew in complexity.
sentences.cn: 去年结构化证券发行飙升至2万亿美元,复杂程度也不断增加.

sentences.en: The application and issuance of Plant Import Licence are free of charge.
sentences.cn: 申请及签发植物进口证均不需缴费.

sentences.en: The bond issuance fee for issuing a total of 0.10 percent.
sentences.cn: 该债券发行手续费为发行总额的0.10%.

sentences.en: The issuance of success, the company's asset ratio dropped to 73.82 percent.
sentences.cn: 此次增发成功后, 公司的资产负债率下降到73.82%.

sentences.en: The issuance of the cards will not be limited.
The issuance of too much currency had led to major price rises.
sentences.cn: 票子发得多了一点,物价波动大了一点.

sentences.en: The notarial certificate comes into effect as of the date of issuance.
sentences.cn: 公证书自出具之日起生效.

sentences.en: The official rights template included in Issuance License is invalid.
sentences.cn: “发行许可证”中包含的正式权限模板无效.

sentences.en: The results suggest that the performance following different issuance is different.
sentences.cn: 研究表明,三种再融资方式的绩效存在显著差异.

sentences.en: Usually, consent negotiations can take place either before or after the issuance of a formal complaint.
sentences.cn: 通常情况下, 同意谈判既可发生于正式申诉之前亦可发生于其后.

words.tran_cn: 发行；流出；造成…结果；传下
发行，发布；发给；放出，排出
